title: A Farewell Without Tears
description: The classic drama about an American soldier’s romance with a nurse and the war keeping them apart.
quote: I shall have a memory of you for my eyes, thoughts of you for my mind, and a touch of you for all of me.
altHero: Barbara Jean Trenton and Jerry Herndon in an embrace, dressed in a nurse and military uniform respectively
